name: dynamaker-qfs-elfsquad-integration
description: AWS SAM app for DynaMaker QFS and Elfsquad integration

scripts.invoke-local-trigger: sam local invoke QFSTaskTrigger --event events/trigger.json --env-vars .env.local.json --parameter-overrides $(grep -v '^#' .env.local | xargs)
scripts.invoke-local-callback: sam local invoke QFSCallback --event events/callback.json --env-vars .env.local.json --parameter-overrides $(grep -v '^#' .env.local | xargs)
